You are evaluating expense management capabilities in Dynamics 365 Finance.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
Hot Area:
//IMG//

HOTSPOT
-

A company is evaluating Dynamics 365 deployment options.

For each of the following statements, select Yes if the statement is true. Otherwise, select No.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

//IMG//

comments.content: correction, yes yes yes is the correct answer. Microsoft provides the infrastructure, but the client is the trustee

Yes yes no is the correct answer. A "cloud deployment data trustee" refers to an individual or entity within an organization that holds ultimate responsibility for the security, privacy, and compliance of data stored and processed on a cloud platform, ensuring that all data management practices adhere to relevant regulations and company policies within the cloud environment; essentially, they are the "guardian" of the data in the cloud, overseeing its integrity and proper usage.

questions.question_text:
A company uses Dynamics 365 Finance.

You need to explain the settlement process.

Which two statements describe the capabilities of the Cash and bank management module? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

choices.C: Payments can be settled against a transaction in the same legal entity only.
choices.B: Payments are only settled after they are posted.
choices.D: Settlement occurs for the customer and vendor invoices and their payments.
choices.A: Settlement can occur between any transaction types that affect the vendor balance or customer balance.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BD
b and d
